an10.179:0.3: 179. The Teaching of the Noble Ones
an10.179:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the noble ones, and what is not the teaching of the noble ones.
an10.179:1.2: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. …
an10.179:1.3: And what is not the teaching of the noble ones?
an10.179:1.6: This is called what is not the teaching of the noble ones.
an10.179:2.1: And what is the teaching of the noble ones?
an10.179:2.4: This is called the teaching of the noble ones.”
